deweni loka yuddhaya pawathi kalaya purama ohu ema padawiya dariya. 1951 di kolambaa nagara sabha komasaris lesa sewayata pathwu gopallawa 1957 di ema padawiyen illa aswiya. 1958 juni 18 da es.dab.aar.di bandaranayaka rajaya, chinaya rajaya sama" thathapathi sabadatha athi karagath awasthawe china thanapathi lesa path kara yawini. 1961 sap 7 dina sita yali kadawu ohu amarikawe thanapathi lesa path kerina. 1962 wana thek ohu ema thanathura siti athara ema wasare nawatha kadawuye lankawe agrandukara dhuraya pirinamini.
